title: 4-7-8 Breathing
description: A calming breathing technique to reduce anxiety. Breathe in for 4 seconds, hold for 7, exhale for 8.

title: Box Breathing
description: Square breathing pattern used by Navy SEALs. Breathe in for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4.

title: Alternate Breathing
description: Ancient yogic breathing technique for balance. Breathe through one nostril at a time.

title: Body Scan Meditation
description: Progressive relaxation technique. Focus awareness on each part of your body from toes to head.

title: Loving-Kindness Meditation
description: Cultivate compassion for yourself and others. Send positive wishes to loved ones and all beings.

title: Mindful Observation
description: Choose an object and observe it mindfully. Notice every detail without judgment.

title: Guided Visualization
description: Imagine a peaceful place. Engage all your senses to create a vivid mental sanctuary.

title: Gratitude Journal
description: Write about three things you're grateful for today and why they matter to you.

title: Stream of Consciousness
description: Write continuously without stopping. Let your thoughts flow freely onto the page.

title: Letter to Future Self
description: Write a letter to yourself one year from now. Share your hopes, dreams, and advice.

title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: Tense and release each muscle group. Start with your toes and work up to your face.

title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
description: Identify 5 things you see, 4 you hear, 3 you feel, 2 you smell, 1 you taste. Grounds you in the present.

title: Walking Meditation
description: Walk slowly and mindfully. Focus on each step, your breath, and the sensations in your body.

title: Gentle Stretching Flow
description: Simple yoga-inspired stretches. Move slowly, breathe deeply, honor your body's limits.

title: Emotional Check-In
description: Name your current emotions. Explore what triggered them and what you need right now.
